QueryViewSpec.Name: Find Distribution Totals Not Equal To Revenue Amount Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Find Distribution Totals Not Equal To Revenue Amount Query
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RevenueGLDistributionTotal as ( select r.BATCHNUMBER, r.ID, sum (dist.AMOUNT) as TOTALDISTRIBUTIONAMOUNT from dbo.REVENUE r join [V_QUERY_REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION] dist on r.ID = dist.REVENUEID
where r.DATE >= dateadd(mm,-2,getdate()) and dist.TRANSACTIONTYPE = 'Credit'
group by r.BATCHNUMBER, r.ID )
select r.ID as REVENUEID, c.ID as CONSTITUENTID, r.LOOKUPID as REVENUELOOKUPID, d.BATCHNUMBER, c.LOOKUPID as CONSTITUENTLOOKUPID, c.NAME, r.AMOUNT, d.TOTALDISTRIBUTIONAMOUNT, dist.TRANSACTIONTYPE, dist.ACCOUNTALIAS, dist.ACCOUNT from RevenueGLDistributionTotal d join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = d.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on r.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID join [V_QUERY_REVENUEGLDISTRIBUTION] dist on r.ID = dist.REVENUEID
where r.AMOUNT <> d.TOTALDISTRIBUTIONAMOUNT
